title: 服务器连不上还疯狂报错
author: Acrowx
txt_content: 如题，下面日志，求大佬看看八月 17, 2019 10:03:08 下午 net.wimpi.serverd.net.ConnectionManager cleanupClosed 信息: cleanupClosed():: Removing closed connection Thread[Connection2245,5,] 八月 17, 2019 10:03:08 下午 net.wimpi.serverd.net.ConnectionManager makeConnection 信息: connection #11 made. Unexpected error in shell! java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)  at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)  at java.io.DataInputStream.readUnsignedByte(Unknown Source) at net.wimpi.serverd.io.TelnetIO.rawread(Unknown Source) at net.wimpi.serverd.io.TelnetIO.read(Unknown Source) at net.wimpi.serverd.io.TerminalIO.read(Unknown Source) at com.drdanick.优化.Telnet.TelnetIOInputStream.readLine(TelnetIOInputStream.java:71) at com.drdanick.优化.Telnet.ConsoleShell.run(ConsoleShell.java:58) at net.wimpi.serverd.net.Connection.run(Unknown Source)  八月 17, 2019 10:03:09 下午 net.wimpi.serverd.net.ConnectionManager cleanupClosed  信息: cleanupClosed():: Removing closed connection Thread[Connection2312,5,]  八月 17, 2019 10:03:12 下午 net.wimpi.serverd.net.ConnectionManager makeConnection

replies.author: quzhonghou
replies.txt_content: 或许可以重启服务器吧 这么多未知源

replies.author: Nitric_acid
replies.txt_content: 少年，我劝你自己重新从头搞服务端吧，这样你会很清楚服务端出什么问题
